rules: No trading after 14h market time
Move to B/E at least after 1R of price going in my favor
After a very long (> 2h) trend down or consolidation, wait for a pullback and see if it will go down
If the price drop is large (check ATR) and there are more than 4 red candles, wait for the pullback
When in trade and after 10-15 minutes it is going sideways and then up, exit the trade
stopLoss: Any significant level if close (PDC, pre market low, pivots, VWAP...)
Previous or current 5 minute candle high
If 5 minute candles are very large, possibly their middle
targets: Any significant level if close (PDC, pre market low, pivots, VWAP...)
Daily levels (open-close, high-low of the candles on the daily chart)

indicators: SPY trending down
SPY trending sideways
More orders on the BID side in LVL2
Increasing volume on the red candles
5 minute chart with two consecutive red candles with lower lows and lower highs (white candle can appear but it should also have LL&LH)
PDC nearby (preferably above)
Pre market low nearby (preferably above)
confirmations: T&S printing speed increases and price is going down
Two 1 minute red candles with LL&LH forming (after a pullback or consolidation) but no more than 4 if the drop is too extended
entrySignals: T&S prints price that is lower than low of the day price

rules: Move to B/E at least after 1R of price going in my favor
Don't chase missed entry
Don't enter trades if the volume is decreasing
Avoid trades when the price action is choppy (very big pullbacks)
Don't enter on small pullbacks (a few candles) that appear after a recent BHOD happened on a larger time period (manny candles between HODs)
stopLoss: Any significant level if close (PDC, PMH, PML, pivots, VWAP, daily levels...)
Previous or current 5 minute candle low, or if the candles are large possibly their middle
targets: Any significant level if close (PDC, PMH, PML, pivots, VWAP, daily levels...) - consult ATR
Monitor SPY levels and behaviour as well

indicators: SPY trending up on good volume
SPY trending sideways and then punches up on good volume
Big orders on the ASK side in LVL2
Increasing volume on the green candles on 1 minute and 5 minute charts
5 minute chart with two consecutive green candles with higher lows and higher highs (red candle can appear but it should also have HL&HH)
PDC/PMH nearby (preferably below)
Price action goes from LOD to HOD in a smooth fashion
confirmations: T&S printing speed increases while price is going up
At least two 1 minute green candles with HL&HH forming (after a pullback or consolidation) but no more than 4 if the price is too extended
entrySignals: Price of the stock rises above the HOD on the b id side
Price begins to approach HOD fast on high volume
On pullback, if the price makes two green candles with HL&HH on high volume

rules: No trading after 14h market time
Move to B/E at least after 1R of price going in my favor
After a very long (> 2h) trend down or consolidation, wait for a pullback and see if it will go up
If the price is too extended (check ATR) and there are more than 4 red candles, wait for the pullback
When in trade and after 10-15 minutes it is going sideways and then down, exit the trade
stopLoss: Any significant level if close (PDC, pre market low, pivots, VWAP...)
Previous or current 5 minute candle low
If 5 minute candles are very large, possibly their middle
targets: Any significant level if close (PDC, pre market low, pivots, VWAP...)
Daily levels (open-close, high-low of the candles on the daily chart)

indicators: SPY trending up
SPY trending sideways
More orders on the ASK side in LVL2
Increasing volume on the green candles
5 minute chart with two consecutive red candles with higher lows and higher highs (white candle can appear but it should also have HL&HH)
PDC nearby (preferably below)
Pre market high nearby (preferably below)
confirmations: T&S printing speed increases and price is going up
Two 1 minute red candles with HL&HH forming (after a pullback or consolidation) but no more than 4 if the price is too extended
entrySignals: T&S prints price that is higher than high of the day price
